import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./header.css" const Header = () => { /*=============== Change Background Header ===============*/ window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const header = document.querySelector(".header") if (this.scrollY >= 80) header.classList.add("scroll-header"); else header.classList.remove("scroll-header"); }); /*=============== Toggle Menu ===============*/ const[Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState("#home"); return ( // EDIT SECTIONS LATER
